item.title:
Rev:1055624 [nsams] - Actually debugController is 0 on shutdown
Fix tests by giving them some more time to update
Fix crash on shutdown with active DebugSession
Remove unused code; currentFrame/Thread is handled by FrameStackModel.
item.description:
Actually debugController is 0 on shutdown
Fix tests by giving them some more time to update
Fix crash on shutdown with active DebugSession
Remove unused code; currentFrame/Thread is handled by FrameStackModel.

item.title:
Rev:1055240 [vprus] - Revert removal of s_appRunning. This change broke adding breakpoints while
application is running, and had other bugs. The ideal solution is to add
support for non-stop mode, including keeping per-thread 'running' state and
automatically picking a suitable thread to use for inserting breakpoint.
However, such changes are too big, and we're in feature freeze.
item.description:
Revert removal of s_appRunning. This change broke adding breakpoints while
application is running, and had other bugs. The ideal solution is to add
support for non-stop mode, including keeping per-thread 'running' state and
automatically picking a suitable thread to use for inserting breakpoint.
However, such changes are too big, and we're in feature freeze.

(2009-11-27 16:57:38)
debuggers/gdb/gdbglobal.h, debuggers/gdb/debugsession.cpp
item.author: Vladimir Prus <ghost cs.msu.su>

item.title:

item.title:
Rev:1054005 [zwabel] - Never temporarily modify macros in the current environment, as it crashes if
the macro has been mmapped in read-only mode. Instead, insert temporary
macros. BUG: 216071
item.description:
Never temporarily modify macros in the current environment, as it crashes if
the macro has been mmapped in read-only mode. Instead, insert temporary
macros. BUG: 216071
